name: domv-popup
description: Display DOM elements with fixed position (a popup) relative to an "owning" element. This is a neat workaround for stacking context limitations in CSS (z-index, overflow:hidden, etc)

scripts.bundle: browserify --outfile build/domv.js -r domv && browserify --exclude domv --outfile build/domv-popup.js -r ./lib/Popup.js:domv-popup

author: Joris van der Wel <joris@jorisvanderwel.com>
